title: Add extract-method refactoring detection
description: Detect when implementation could benefit from extract-method refactoring

title: Mutation testing integration
description: Integrate mutation testing to verify test quality. Deferred from V1 - nice to have, not essential for TDD loop.

title: Code review phase
description: Add an automated code review phase to the TDD workflow. Deferred from V1 - can use IDE inspections manually for now.

title: PR generation
description: Auto-generate pull requests from completed TDD cycles. Deferred from V1 - low friction to do manually.

title: Multi-language support
description: Support languages beyond Kotlin (Java, TypeScript, etc). Deferred from V1 - start with Kotlin only.

title: State persistence
description: Persist TDD session state across IDE restarts. Deferred from V1 - sessions are short, restart is fine.

title: Research phase in workflow
description: Add a codebase research phase before test generation. Deferred from V1 - manual codebase exploration works.

title: Web UI
description: Alternative web-based UI for the TDD agent. Deferred from V1 - plugin is better for target audience.

title: Refactoring commands
description: Add refactoring step to TDD cycle (Red-Green-Refactor). Deferred from V1 - IDE refactoring works fine manually.
